Uses of PublicationsStatistics in applicationLogic.conference.trend
 

Methods in applicationLogic.conference.trend that return types with arguments of type PublicationsStatistics
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> TimeTrend.getProductivityTrend()
          Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each year of the conference.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> TimeTrend.getProductivityTrendActiveAuthors()
          Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each year of the conference.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> TimeTrend.getPublicationsTimeTrend()
          Returns a list of PublicationStatistics, containing the number of publications for each year.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> TimeTrend.getPublicationsTimeWindowTrend(int firstYear, int lastYear)
          Returns a list of PublicationStatistics.

Methods in applicationLogic.journal.trend that return types with arguments of type PublicationsStatistics
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> VolumeTrend.getProductivityTrend()
          Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each volume of the transaction.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> VolumeTrend.getProductivityTrendActiveAuthors()
          Returns the productivity rate, i.e. the average number of papers per author, for each volume of the transaction.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> VolumeTrend.getPublicationsVolumeTrend()
          Returns a list of PublicationStatistics, containing the number of publications for each volume number.
 java.util.List<PublicationsStatistics> VolumeTrend.getPublicationsVolumeWindowTrend(int firstVolume, int lastVolume)
          Returns a list of PublicationStatistics.
